Name: The Edgar Mitchell Overview Effect VR Experience
About the game: The Edgar Mitchell VR experience invites the world to join the Apollo 14 Astronaut on his mission to the Moon and into his most intimate moment of connection to life itself. As we journey through space, we will hear Edgarâ€™s voice guide us through the dissolving of any and all boundaries within our consciousness to the universal connection we humans share. In concert with stunning images of the cosmos, historic NASA audio, carefully crafted sound design, sensation inducing haptic gear, and epic music, the Edgar Mitchell VR Experience will take users on meditative, visceral experience of transcendence. Sit comfortably, quiet your mind, and relax.
